subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-hander José Contreras was placed on the 15-day disabled list with a pinched nerve in his right leg, dealing the defending World Series champion Chicago White Sox their first significant setback of the season.
snippet: The right-hander José Contreras was placed on the 15-day disabled list with a pinched nerve in his right leg, dealing the defending World Series champion Chicago White Sox their first significant setback of the season.
